definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: This article Legionella disease related to recent research carried out on the preliminary.
sentences.chinese: 本文就军团菌病有关研究近况进行了初步阐述。

sentences.english: The discipline of legionaries is absolute.
sentences.chinese: 纪律保证了军团士兵的绝对服从。

sentences.english: The subject for discussion was the future of Rommel and his Africa Corps.
sentences.chinese: 讨论的题目是隆美尔及其非州军团的下场。

sentences.english: The restless scourge will become a even greater threat to this world.
sentences.chinese: 无止尽的天灾军团对这个世界的挟制会越来越大。

sentences.english: The Rossoneri's club will try to emulate in Japan the feat of the Cavallino.
sentences.chinese: 红黑军团也将在日本仿效法拉利一样获得成功。

sentences.english: It seemed the worst moment for the Rossoneri, but Pippo Inzaghi changed everything.
sentences.chinese: 看上去形势对红黑军团不利，但因扎吉改变了一切。

sentences.english: The legionaries, on their victorious return, refused any longer to obey the consuls.
sentences.chinese: 军团士兵在凯旋归国时，不肯服从执政官的命令。

sentences.english: So I am thinking about it, " the Bianconeri hero concluded cryptically."
sentences.chinese: 斑马军团的英雄的回答很模糊。

sentences.english: The Caesar's Legion is comprised mostly of reconditioned tribals and their descendants.
sentences.chinese: 凯撒军团主要由被其征服的部落以及他们的后代组成。

sentences.english: They indicated your regiment in the British military. And so on.
sentences.chinese: 他们用来分别你所在的不列颠军团的。

sentences.english: The Chelsea boss is also wary of the Toon Army effect.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西教练很警惕纽卡斯尔军团的影响。

sentences.english: He has what it takes to wear the Bianconeri shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他有能力穿上斑马军团的黑白剑条衫。

sentences.english: Los Blancos should support the coach and his players to death.
sentences.chinese: 白衣军团应当誓死捍卫他们的球员和教练。

sentences.english: Facchetti chose the Milanese Nerazzurri, and would go on to become a legend.
sentences.chinese: 法切蒂选择了蓝黑军团，最终成为一代传奇人物。

sentences.english: Meereen has an army of Unsullied infantry, the finest in the world.
sentences.chinese: 弥林有着无垢者军团，全世界最好的军团。
